segments.text: Craig , what do you do for work ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What school do you go to ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's a good school . What do you study ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm studying English , math , and history . My major is English .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How long have you been studying English ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah , I started to learn English when I was in high school .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No wonder your English is so good .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Actually , it's not that good . I can read but I can't speak very well . I haven't had a lot of chance to practice .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I see . Talking with other people is very important .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , but I still don't have many friends here yet .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm having a party tonight at my apartment . You should come .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh thanks for inviting me . I'd love to come .
segments.speaker: S2
